nodes.text: A jukebox was a device that played music. At least some models were designed so that the user could insert jukebox tokens into the machine and then select from a catalog of songs. Jukeboxes were commonly found in cantinas throughout the galaxy. In 15 BBY, the R2-series astromech droid R2-D2 danced in front of a jukebox in a cantina on the planet Manda.
